feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-23T15:57:00.294601Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;魔法王国的落魄（2003）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086-h/8086-h.htm</id>; <已更新>;2023-07-23T10：56：57.056442Z </已更新>; <link href="https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086-h/8086-h.htm"/>; <作者>; <name>;keepamovin </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;《魔法王国的落魄》是一个引人入胜的科幻故事，故事发生在未来，沃尔特·迪士尼已经统治了世界，死亡也得到了治愈。主角努力保护魔法王国最初的人类面貌，对抗地球的后人类继承者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#down-and-out-in-the-magic-kingdom-2003" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833951" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;多亏了这个博客，我找到了一份 IT 工作</stitle>; <id>;https://giuliomagnifico.blog/misc/2023/07/22/I-found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T06:56:57.057701Z</updated>; <link href="https://giuliomag nifico.blog/misc/2023/07/22/I-found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html"/>; <author>; <name>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://giuliomagnifico.blog/_images/202 3/IT-jobs-blog/IMG_9768.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;一家安全公司在阅读作者的博文后向作者提供了一份工作。作者接受了这份工作，现在担任 DevOps 或系统管理员，使用 Grafana 和 Prometheus 构建数据中心并创建监控系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-found-an-it-job-thanks-to-this-blog" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833089" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;茎公式</stitle>; <id>;https://stemformulas.com/formulas/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T10:56:57.058647Z</updated>; <link href="https://stemformulas.com/formulas/"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文包含与向量微积分和矩阵乘法相关的数学方程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stem-formulas" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817851" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;什么每个 IT 人员都需要了解 OpenBSD (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://nxdomain.no/~peter/what_every_it_person_needs_to_know_about_openbsd.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T07:56:57.059429Z</updated>; <link href="https://nxdomain.no/~peter/what_every_it_person_ need_to_know_about_openbsd.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nxdomain.no/~peter/blogpix/tshirt-4.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 192px;" />;<br />;OpenBSD 是一个免费且安全的操作系统，专注于正确且安全的代码。它率先使用了强加密技术，并以其代码审计实践而闻名。 OpenBSD 广泛应用于以网络为中心的角色，并且是多种广泛使用的软件组件的来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-every-it-person-needs-to-know-about-openbsd-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833393" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;丰田一直在开发续航里程为 745 英里的电动汽车固态电池</stitle>; <id>;https://www.topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state-battery/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T09:56:57.060218Z</updated>; <link href="https://www .topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state-battery/"/>; <作者>; <name>;achow</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=achow</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static1.topspeedimages.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/toyota-bz4x-2023 -1600-1e-fotor-20230720175837.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;丰田开发了一款用于电动汽车的固态电池，续航里程为 745 英里，充电时间为 10 分钟，给行业带来了革命性的变化。这一突破表明丰田对后 ICE 未来的态度发生了转变。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#toyota-has-been-developmenting-a-solid-state-battery-for-evs-with-a-range-of-745mi" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833836" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;简单破坏现场手册 - 如何摧毁您的组织</stitle>; <id>;https://butwhatfor.beehiiv.com/p/simple-sabotage-field-manual-destroy-organizations</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T02:56:57.06100 1Z</updated>; <link href="https://butwhatfor.beehiiv.com/p/simple-sabotage-field-manual-destroy-organizations"/>; <author>; <name>;stanrivers</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stanrivers</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-向下，format=auto，onerror=redirect，quality=80/uploads/publication/logo/6e13193f-5294-4834-b927-9e7eb6a11f23/thumb_BWF_Blue_Logo_800.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;《简单破坏现场手册》是二战期间战略情报局使用的指南，用于培训德国占领区的个人如何破坏他们的工作场所。它提供了煽动和执行简单破坏活动的建议，其中包括做出错误决定、采取不合作态度以及诱导其他人也这样做。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#simple-sabotage-field-manual-how-to-destroy-your-organizations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36831946" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;中世纪餐桌礼仪：最梅西的神话？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.medievalists.net/2023/06/medieval-table-manners/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T09:56:57.062790Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.medievalists.net/202 3/06/medieval-table-manners/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;BerislavLopac</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=BerislavLopac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.medievalists.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/medieval-table-manners.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：126px；” />;<br />;中世纪人们的餐桌礼仪和期望与现代社会相似。他们饭前洗手、餐巾纸并重视一张布置良好的餐桌。他们应该有尊严地吃饭，不要含着食物说话，并避免凌乱的饮食习惯。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#medieval-table-manners-the-messiest-myth" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811460" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MOVEit 人数接近 400 个组织、超过 2000 万个人</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/moveit_victim_count/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T13:56:57.063626Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023 /07/20/moveit_victim_count/"/>; <author>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2016/07/19/data_breach_shutterstock.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;随着大规模供应链攻击的影响进入第七周，与 MOVEit 文件传输黑客攻击相关的受害者数量和成本继续攀升。截至今天，受影响的组织数量已接近 400 个，其中包括一些非常知名的组织。据网络安全机构 Emsisoft 称，截至 7 月 19 日，已有 383 个组织和超过 2000 万人受到威胁。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#moveit-body-count-closes-in-on-400-orgs-20m-individuals" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835293" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Valgrind 获得 FUTO 的开发小额资助</stitle>; <id>;https://fosstodon.org/@sourceware/110760408112704937</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T12:56:57.064460Z</updated>; <link href="https://fo sstodon.org/@sourceware/110760408112704937"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Valgrind 从 FUTO 获得一笔开发小额赠款，用于维护和扩展其基础设施。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#valgrind-recieves-a-development-microgrant-from-futo" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36834675" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一位罗马尼亚经济学家合法玩彩票</stitle>; <id>;https://thehustle.co/the-man-who-won-the-lottery-14-times/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T11:56:57.065336Z</updated>; <link href="https://thehustle.co/the-man-who-won-the- lottery-14-times/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Anon84</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Anon84</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thehustle.co/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/lotto-header.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;罗马尼亚经济学家斯特凡·曼德尔（Stefan Mandel）使用选号算法多次中奖。他开发了一个系统，该系统涉及购买所有可能的数字组合，并说服投资者将资金集中在一起。曼德尔赢得了几张彩票并成为国际头条新闻。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-romanian-economist-legally-gamed-the-lottery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36834415" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;riscv64 现已成为官方 Debian 架构（正在进行重启）</stitle>; <id>;https://lists.debian.org/debian-riscv/2023/07/msg00053.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T12:56:57.066182Z</updated>; <link href="https://lists.betacat.io/feed.xml">; debian.org/debian-riscv/2023/07/msg00053.html"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;回复：<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#riscv64-is-now-an-official-debian-architecture -rebootstrap-in-progress" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36834701" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我为极简主义者和我自己制作了一个可定制的 iOS 浏览器</stitle>; <id>;https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quiche-browser/id1668363952</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T12:56:57.066995Z</updated>; <link href="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quiche-browser/id1668363952"/>; <author>; <name>;nckh</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nckh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://is1-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/Purple126/v4/aa/5b/6c/aa5b6cdf-5397-6c14-76d4-d23d46f7e34c/AppIcon-1 x_U007ephone-0-0-0-0-0-85-220.png/1200x630wa.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;最可定制的浏览器，允许用户个性化工具栏、弹出菜单、地址栏等。它还提供增强的选项卡管理并优先考虑用户隐私。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-customized-ios-browser-for-minimalists-and-myself" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.y Combinator.com/item?id=36834732" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何在家制作奶酪</stitle>; <id>;https://www.themanual.com/food-and-drink/how-to-make-cheese/</id>; <更新>;2023- 07-23T01:56:57.067822Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.themanual.com/food-and-drink/how-to-make-cheese/"/>; <作者>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.themanual.com/wp- content/uploads/sites/9/2021/04/a-novice-cheesemakers-guide-on-how-to-make-cheese-at-home.jpg?fit=800%2C800&p=1" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;奶酪制作艺术是一项历史悠久的传统，远没有人们想象的那么复杂。如果您是奶酪鉴赏家，知道如何在家制作奶酪可以开启一个未经高温消毒的可能性世界。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-make-cheese-at-home" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36811316" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;最高的中庭（2019）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.world-architects.com/en/architecture-news/found/inside-the-worlds -tallest-atrium</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T04:56:57.068655Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.world-architects.com/en/architecture-news/found/inside-the-worlds-tallest-atrium"/>; <作者>; <name>;近日点</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=peri helions</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.world-architects.com/images/CmsImageContent/77/27/00/03f2b11e561a46eb81cb305e8fd2c4b9/03f2b11e561a46eb81cb305e8fd2c4b9.f5fb74 44.jpg"样式="宽度:220px;高度：233px;" />;<br />;由扎哈·哈迪德建筑事务所设计的 45 层办公楼丽泽 SOHO 本周在北京新丰台商务区竣工。塔内的扭曲中庭是世界最高的，比卓美亚帆船酒店高出近 15 米。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-tallest-atrium-2019" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810937" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;EasyGraph：图形分析和社交计算的综合工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/easy-graph/ Easy-Graph</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T04:56:57.070318Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/easy-graph/Easy-Graph"/>; <作者>; <name>;DinoPeppa</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DinoPeppa</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://opengraph.githubassets.com/44c87c1bbe99c74e1a30a254a11315005d59b0704dea28dd4283da07021e2d34/easy-graph/Easy-Graph" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;EasyGraph是一个用Python编写的开源图处理库，支持无向图和有向图的分析，并实现了各种图挖掘算法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#easygraph-a-compressive-tool-for-graph-analysis-and-social-computing" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36832433" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我的乐器教会了我什么</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/culture/the-weekend-essay/what-my-musical-instruments-have-taught-me</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T02:56:57.071137Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/culture/the-weekend-essay/what-my-musical-instruments-have-taught-me"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jvandonsel </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jvandonsel</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/64b961418cd3dd8925166e06/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/Lanier-Learning-Every-Instrument.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 270px;" />;<br />;母亲去世后，Jaron Lanier 迷上了钢琴，并开始用尽全力弹奏。此后，他成为了一名新乐器的强迫性探索者，学习演奏各种乐器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-my-musical-instruments-have-taught-me" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.height: 270px;" />;<br />; ycombinator.com/item?id=36831879" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LATEX 中生僻字的排版 (2003) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tug.org/TUGboat/tb24-3/wong.pdf </id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T12:56:57.071950Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tug.org/TUGboat/tb24-3/wong.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;lermontov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lermontov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;书面中文有几万但大多数可用的字体仅包含大约 6 至 12000 个常用字符，可以满足日常用户的需求。本文介绍了一种在 LATEX 中排版此类罕见字符的方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#typesetting-rare-chinese-characters-in-latex-2003-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;加州理工学院诺贝尔奖获得者庆祝百岁生日，然后回去工作</stitle>; < id>;https://www.latimes.com/science/story/2023-07-21/caltech-nobel-laureate-rudy-marcus-turns-100-and-gets-back-to-work</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T19:56:57.072772Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.latimes.com/science/story/2023-07 -21/caltech-nobel-laureate-rudy-marcus-turns-100-and-gets-back-to-work"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/aa698a 7/2147483647/strip/true/crop/4122x2688+0+0/resize/1200x783!/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2Ff6%2F93%2F74bbf1dd46a6ad8c553e8da16c 8b%2F1324895-sci-caltech-nobel-laureate-turns-100-02-mjc.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：144px;" />;<br />;加州理工学院化学教授鲁迪·马库斯 (Rudy Marcus) 通过继续工作庆祝了自己的 100 岁生日。同事和以前的学生聚集在一起向马库斯表示敬意，称他为榜样和科学家的优秀典范。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-caltech-nobel-laureate-celebrates-his-100th-birthday-then-gets-back-to-work" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828811" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;记住电视打字机</stitle>; <id>;https://hackaday.com/2023/07 /20/tv-typewriter-remembered/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T02:56:57.075235Z</updated>; <link href="https://hackaday.com/2023/07/20/tv-typewriter-remembered/"/>; <author>; <name>;beardyw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=beardyw </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hackaday.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/tv_typewriter.jpg?w=800" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Don Lancaster 的 TV Typewriter Cookbook 是一本很受欢迎的书，影响了自制视频显示器和 Apple 1 计算机的发展。它提供了如何构建使用电视进行输出的终端的说明，为 20 世纪 70 年代的家庭计算机用户提供了一种经济高效的解决方案。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tv-typewriter-remembered" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811240" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“培训我的替代者”：呼叫中心员工与人工智能的斗争</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023 /07/19/business/call-center-workers-battle-with-ai.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T14:56:57.076063Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/19/business/call-center-workers-battle-with-ai.html"/>; <author>; <name>;elsewhen</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elsewhen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/19/multimedia/19AI-Customer-Service-Jobs-wjvm/19AI-Customer-Service-Jobs-wjvm-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width ：220像素； height: 275px;" />;<br />;人工智能 (AI) 在客户服务岗位上的崛起引起了员工的担忧，其中包括 AT&T 呼叫中心工作人员 Ylonda Sherrod。她担心自己会被人工智能技术取代，并对自己的工作和生计产生潜在影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#training-my-replacement-inside-a-call-center-workers-battle-with-ai" target="_blank">;[sum mary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835571" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Dot_ix：交互式 GraphViz 点图</stitle>; <id>;https://azriel.im/dot_ix/</ id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T07:56:57.077278Z</更新>; <link href="https://azriel.im/dot_ix/"/>; <作者>; <name>;azriel91</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=azriel91</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# dot-ix-interactive-graphviz-dot-graphs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825069" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Egregoria：3D 城市没有网格的构建器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Uriopass/Egregoria</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T20:56:57.078179Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/Uriopass/Egregoria"/>; <author>; <name>;dosshell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dosshell</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.githubusercontent.com/media/Uriopass/Egregoria/master/assets/screen2.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Egregoria 是一款独立城市建设者，专注于城市的社会经济方面，具有物流元素。它仍处于早期开发和开源阶段，希望让更多人参与其开发。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#egregoria-3d-city-builder-without-a-grid" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36829374" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;德意志银行“功能失调”IT 部门 (2018)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.efinancialcareers.co.uk/news/20 18/04/technology-at-deutsche-bank</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T10:56:57.079050Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.efinancialcareers.co.uk/news/2018/04/technology-at-deutsche-bank"/>; <作者>; <name>;Cwizard</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=Cwizard</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/output=format:webp/resize=width:730,height:432,fit:crop/jbmbWG2TRzaaoQM66rur?cache=true" style="width: 220px; height: 131px;" />;<br />;德意志银行首席运营官 Kim Hammonds 在将银行描述为“极其复杂”和“功能失调”的工作场所后即将离开该银行。她的主要任务是简化银行的操作系统，但两年半后，德意志银行仍然拥有 32 种不同的操作系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#deutsche-bank-s-dysfunction-it- Division-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833915" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TokenFlow：一致的扩散功能，实现一致的视频编辑</stitle>; <id>; https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T22:56:57.079885Z</updated>; <link href="https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;puttycat</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=puttycat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/pics/pipeline.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;Text2video-zero 和 Tune-a-video 是文本到视频扩散模型，可从文本生成视频。结构和内容引导的视频合成以及即插即用扩散功能也可用于文本驱动的图像到图像转换。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tokenflow-consistent-diffusion-features-for-consist-video-editing" target="_blank">;[summ ary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830490" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;客户端代理 – 个性化互联网的更好方法？(2000)</stitle>; <id>;https://people.dsv .su.se/~jpalme/select/csp/thesis.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T04:56:57.080720Z</更新>; <link href="https://people.dsv.su.se/~jpalme/select/csp/thesis.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;userbinator</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=userbinator</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://people.dsv.su.se/~jpalme/select/csp/images/4_1_1.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 107px;" />;<br />;客户端代理是在 Internet 上查找数据并将其转换为有用信息的另一种方法。它们能够拦截通信并根据个人需求调整内容。但是，与其他方法相比，它们可能会产生更大的开销，并且更难以安装和配置。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#client-side-proxies-a-better-way-to-individualise-the-internet-2000" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824165" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
